markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 17"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Favor of Heaven](/Feats.aspx?ID=2445) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Tengu" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=240" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 59 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

You're one of [Hei Feng's](/Deities.aspx?ID=40) chosen people and have the authority of the Celestial Court on your side. Once per day, you can cast a 6th-level [_spirit blast_](/Spells.aspx?ID=301) as a divine innate spell. In addition, you gain resistance 5 to both good and evil damage.
name: Favor of Heaven

text: <title level="1" right="Feat 17" pfs="Standard" > Favor of Heaven Source Ancestry Guide pg. 59 2.0 --- You're one of Hei Feng's chosen people and have the authority of the Celestial Court on your side. Once per day, you can cast a 6th-level spirit blast as a divine innate spell. In addition, you gain resistance 5 to both good and evil damage.
